org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory

Interface BlockInventoryEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, CauseTracked, Event, GameEvent, InventoryEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BrewEvent, BrewingStandBrewEvent, BrewingStandEvent, FurnaceConsumeFuelEvent, FurnaceEvent, FurnaceSmeltItemEvent

    public interface BlockInventoryEvent
extends InventoryEvent, BlockEvent
    Represents an InventoryEvent that involves a Block as a carrier.
